templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

select fld = if (d.seq = 1) "A" elseif (d.seq = 2) "B" elseif (d.seq = 3) "C" elseif (d.seq = 4) "D" elseif (d.seq = 5) "E" elseif (d.seq = 6) "F" elseif (d.seq = 7) "G" elseif (d.seq = 8) "H" elseif (d.seq = 9) "I" elseif (d.seq = 10) "J" elseif (d.seq = 11) "K" elseif (d.seq = 12) "L" elseif (d.seq = 13) "M" elseif (d.seq = 14) "N" elseif (d.seq = 15) "O" elseif (d.seq = 16) "P" elseif (d.seq = 17) "Q" elseif (d.seq = 18) "R" elseif (d.seq = 19) "S" elseif (d.seq = 20) "T" elseif (d.seq = 21) "U" elseif (d.seq = 22) "V" elseif (d.seq = 23) "W" elseif (d.seq = 24) "X" elseif (d.seq = 25) "Y" elseif (d.seq = 26) "Z" elseif (d.seq = 27) "0" elseif (d.seq = 28) "1" elseif (d.seq = 29) "2" elseif (d.seq = 30) "3" elseif (d.seq = 31) "4" elseif (d.seq = 32) "5" elseif (d.seq = 33) "6" elseif (d.seq = 34) "7" elseif (d.seq = 35) "8" elseif (d.seq = 36) "9" elseif (d.seq = 37) "ANY" else "OTHER" ENDIF FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(38))

SELECT IF (PAR1="ANY") SOURCE_STRING = "*ANYTHING", _hidden=0 elseif (PAR1 != "OTHER") SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE CNVTUPPER(n.source_string) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) else SOURCE_STRING=n.source_string, _hidden=n.nomenclature_id, Vocabulary=cv.display FROM nomenclature n, code_value cv PLAN cv WHERE cv.code_set=400 and cv.active_ind=1 and cv.cdf_meaning in ("MUL.ALGCAT", "MUL.DRUG", "ALLERGY") JOIN n WHERE cnvtupper(n.source_string)!=" " AND n.source_string NOT BETWEEN "0*" AND "Z*" AND n.source_vocabulary_cd= cv.code_value ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string) ENDIF

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: An allergy exists that ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALLERGY_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Allergy action is ACTION_TYPE and allergy ALLERGY_QUAL OPT_ALLERGY for OPT_CATEGORY category with reaction OPT_REACTION_QUAL OPT_REACTION and OPT_REACTION_TYPE, OPT_REACTION_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_INFO_SOURCE, OPT_CANCEL_REASON. Optionally narrow allergy matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_NOTIFY
templateDefinitions.definition: send subject SUBJECT with message MESSAGE to LOCATION linked to procedure PROCEDURE with priority PRIORITY under categories CLASS and SUBCLASS

column.value: Clinical Event End Date and Time
Clinical Event End Date and Time

statements.statement: select c.display_key ,c.cdf_meaning ,c.code_value from code_value c where c.code_set=220 and c.active_ind= 1 and c.begin_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and c.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("ROOM","BED","FACILITY","BUILDING", "APPTROOT","BBDRAW","BBOWNERROOT","BBINVAREA", "COLLROOT","COLLRTE","COLLRUN","CSLOGIN","CSTRACK", "HIM","HIMROOT","INVGRP","INVLOC","INVLOCATOR","INVVIEW") and NOT c.cdf_meaning in ("MICRO STATIS","MMGRPROOT", "PTTRACK","PTTRACKROOT","PTRECYCLE","RXLOCGROUP","SRVAREA", "STORAGERACK","STORAGEROOT","STORAGESHELF","STORAGETRAY", "STORAGEUNIT","SURGFILL") order c.display_key

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

customValue.value:
